main event: Sightings of unidentified objects were reported in Miami, Florida, with radar tracking and visual observations.
interesting points: One sighting involved a round red, white and blue object tracked on radar,The object was moving rapidly and was described as probably being a balloon,Another sighting was of a large metallic silvery disc-shaped craft hovering offshore,The object hovered for 10-15 minutes before accelerating and disappearing,There was also a report of a bright purple balloon object that gained altitude and disappeared after 5 minutes.
sighted object: round object, large metallic disc, bright purple balloon
witness description: Virginia Francis made a report to the Miami UFO Group.
